General.Name: Zhejiang Meida Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Meida Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of household kitchen appliances primarily integrated stove products in China. It offers range hoods, stoves, disinfection cabinets, storage cabinets, electric ovens, and electric steamers, as well as integrated sinks, water purifiers, and built-in kitchen appliances. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Haining, China.

4.Name: Ms. Xu  Hong
4.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
